content: crème de la crème cardigan by gralina frie this is a no-fuzz top-down raglan cardigan with small rib details around the edges it has a minimum of an a-line to improve the fit over bust and hip the neck is classic round and wide with a great fit over the shoulders and the back the choice of yarn including my favorite qualities as linen alpacka and silk along with the feel and colour led to the name of the pattern the pattern includes instructions for knitting sleeves in pieces or in the round the choice is yours size m yarn 7 skeins of bremont verona 870m/952yrd in 1700 offwhite yardage 870m/952yrd needles us 6 4 0 mm for the ribbing and us 8 5 0 mm needles for the body or size needed to obtain gauge notions 8 mother-of-pearl buttons 2cm ⌀ tapestry needle stitch markers finished measurements circumference hip 101 cm/40 circumference bust 96 cm/38 length sleeves 45 cm/18 from underarm to bobble edge gauge 19 stitches and 24 row = 10 cm/4 on us 8 5 00 mm needles over stockinette stitch this fabric has a certain amount of ease when wearing you may find it difficult to define gauge as the yarn is a little bit uneven my gauge varies from 18 5 to 20sts and the cardigan is still my favourite of all times if you notice that your gauge is on the smaller side and you fear this will get too small try it on after you ve finished all raglan increase row is it too snug work another 1-2 increase row until you proceed to separating body and sleeves you will just have to exchange my numbers to your numbers but otherwise finish by pattern abbreviations st s = stitch es k=knit p=purl pm=place marker slm=slip marker pattern and photos are © gralina frie 2016 this pattern is for personal and non-profit use only except using in classes of which i highly
